Package nl.inl.blacklab.search

Contains the main BlackLab classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompleteQuery
    Represents a combination of a contents query (a TextPattern) and a metadata "filter query" (a regular Lucene Query).
    Concordance
    A concordance (left context, hit text, right context).
    ContentAccessor
    Defines a way to access the original indexed content.
    Hit
    Class for a hit.
    Hits
    Represents a list of Hit objects.
    HitsWindow
    Represents a subset of a Hits object, for example a page of hits.
    IndexStructure
    Determines the structure of a BlackLab index.
    IndexStructure.AltDesc
    Description of a property alternative
    IndexStructure.ComplexFieldDesc
    Description of a complex field
    IndexStructure.PropertyDesc
    Description of a property
    Kwic
    A "keyword in context" for a hit (left context, hit text, right context).
    QueryExecutionContext
    Represents the current "execution context" for executing a TextPattern query.
    Searcher
    The main interface into the BlackLab library.
    SingleDocIdSet
    Used for finding hits in a single document (for highlighting).
    TextPattern
    Describes some pattern of words in a content field.
    TextPatternAnd
    AND query for combining different properties from a complex field.
    TextPatternBoolean
    A TextPattern that performs document-level combining of boolean clauses.
    TextPatternCombiner
    Abstract base class for combining several text patterns into a single new compound TextPattern
    TextPatternContaining
    A TextPattern searching for TextPatterns that contain a hit from another TextPattern.
    TextPatternDocLevelAnd
    A TextPattern returning hits from all clauses, but only in documents that match all clauses.
    TextPatternDocLevelAndNot
    A TextPattern returning hits from the "include" clause, but only in documents where the "exclude" clause doesn't occur.
    TextPatternEdge
    Returns either the left edge or right edge of the specified query.
    TextPatternFuzzy
    A TextPattern matching a word with fuzzy matching.
    TextPatternNot
    NOT operator for TextPattern queries at token and sequence level
    TextPatternOr
    A TextPattern matching at least one of its child clauses.
    TextPatternPrefix
    A TextPattern matching words that start with the specified prefix.
    TextPatternProperty
    TextPattern for wrapping another TextPattern so that it applies to a certain word property.
    TextPatternRegex
    A TextPattern matching a regular expression.
    TextPatternSensitive
    TextPattern for wrapping another TextPattern so that it applies to a certain word property.
    TextPatternTags
    A TextPattern matching a word.
    TextPatternTerm
    A TextPattern matching a word.
    TextPatternTranslator<T>
    Interface for translating a TextPattern into a different representation.
    TextPatternTranslatorString
    Translates a TextPattern to a String, for debugging and testing purposes.
    TextPatternWildcard
    A textpattern matching a simple wildcard expression.
    TextPatternWithin
    A TextPattern searching for a TextPattern inside the hits from another TextPattern.
    TokenFrequency
    One token and its frequency in some context.
    TokenFrequencyList
    A collection of tokens and their (absolute) frequencies.
    TPBooleanClause
    Adapted from Lucene's BooleanClause.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IndexStructure.AltType
    Types of property alternatives
    IndexStructure.FieldType
    Possible types of metadata fields.

Package nl.inl.blacklab.search Description

Contains the main BlackLab classes.

Good starting points are Searcher, TextPattern and Hits.
